explanation: The program omitted handling for values >= 100 that are not multiples of 100, so those inputs produced no output. I fixed the second conditional to also catch any X that is not divisible by 100 (elif X < 100 or X%100 != 0:), ensuring such cases print "No". This follows the idea in the retrieved diffs that extended conditions with an extra 'or' (see patterns like Diff 4/5 and the modulus check idea in Diff 2).
